titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 815) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 815) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 815) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.
